id: Quán lý vũ khí trang bị Cụm_DSMTi3

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
    tb.id AS id_thiet_bi,
    tb.ten_thiet_bi,
    ltb.ten_loai_thiet_bi,
    dv.ten_don_vi,
    tb.nhom,
    tb.cap_trang_bi,
    tb.tinh_trang,
    qn.ten_quan_nhan,
    qn.quan_ham,
    qn.chuc_vu,
    qn.so_dien_thoai
FROM 
    public.e_thiet_bi_mang tb
LEFT JOIN 
    public.loai_thiet_bi ltb ON tb.loai_thiet_bi_id = ltb.id
LEFT JOIN 
    public.don_vi dv ON tb.don_vi_id = dv.id
LEFT JOIN 
    public.quan_nhan qn ON tb.quanh_nhan_id = qn.id
JOIN 
    public.v_thiet_bi_mang cpu 
      ON tb.id = cpu.e_thiet_bi_mang_id AND cpu.a_thiet_bi_mang_id = 4  -- CPU
WHERE 
    tb.loai_thiet_bi_id = 5         -- Máy tính
    AND LOWER(TRIM(cpu.gia_tri)) = 'i3'
ORDER BY 
    tb.id;

unpublishedAction.name: DSMTi3
unpublishedAction.pageId: Quán lý vũ khí trang bị Cụm
